thread.section_title: Artwork of the Day from The Metropolitan Museum of Art
thread.title: Elaine de Kooning (1918-1989)

title: Elaine de Kooning (1918-1989)

organizations.name: estate of fairfield porter / artists rights society

text:
© The Estate of Fairfield Porter / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York Not on view Inscription: Signed and dated (lower right): Fairfield Porter 1957 Exhibition History Jacksonville, Fla. Jacksonville Art Museum. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," February 9–April 21, 1985, unnum. cat. (p. 59).Oklahoma City. Oklahoma Museum of Art. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," May 5–June 30, 1985, unnum. cat.New York. National Academy of Design. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," July 16–September 1, 1985, unnum. cat.Evanston, Ill. Terra Museum of American Art. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," September 15–November 10, 1985, unnum. cat.Little Rock. Arkansas Arts Center. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," November 12, 1985–January 19, 1986, unnum. cat.Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," February 9–March 30, 1986, unnum. cat.St. Paul. Minnesota Museum of Art. "The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art," April 20–June 8, 1986, unnum. cat.Southampton, N. Y. Parrish Art Museum. "Fairfield Porter: An American Painter," June 27–September 12, 1993, no. 14.Mead Art Museum, Amherst College. "Fairfield Porter: An American Painter," October 29–December 24, 1993, no. 14.Snite Museum of Art, University of Notre Dame. "Fairfield Porter: An American Painter," January 20–March 20, 1994, no. 14.Buffalo. Albright-Knox Art Gallery. "Fairfield Porter: An American Painter," May 14–July 3, 1994, no. 14.Waterville, Me. Colby College Museum of Art. "Fairfield Porter: An American Painter," July 20–September 21, 1994, no. 14.New York. Equitable Gallery. "Fairfield Porter: A Life in Art," March 16–May 27, 2000.East Hampton, N.Y. Pollock-Krasner House and Study Center. "Elaine de Kooning Portrayed," August 6–October 31, 2015, no. 15. References Lowery Stokes Sims. The Figure in 20th Century American Art: Selections from The Metropolitan Museum of Art . Exh. cat., Jacksonville Art Museum. New York, 1984, pp. 42, 58–59, ill. Phyllis Braff. Elaine de Kooning Portrayed . Exh. cat., Pollock-Krasner House and Study Center. East Hampton, 2015, pp. 17, 65, ill. and colorpl. 15. Timeline of Art History (2000-present)
